explains: adv. 精细地；巧妙地；敏锐地

sentences.en: Yet rather than the to-be-expected socialist harangue, Allende subtly works her political message within the fabric of the compelling narrative she weaves.
sentences.cn: 然而，阿连德并没有像人们所期待的那样发表社会主义的长篇大论，而是将她的政治信息巧妙地融入了她编织的引人注目的叙事结构中。

sentences.en: Not very subtly, he raised the subject of money.
sentences.cn: 他没有拐弯抹角，直接提出了钱的问题。
